column4: what does it mean when i get this message from apt-get when i'm trying to run "apt-get install php5-pear"? Package php5-pear is not available, but is referred to by another package.
that means there is no pck called php5-pear
pelo, oh ok, so delete home while offline then?
if i do... apt-cache dump | grep ^Package | grep -i pear... i do see it listed... why is it listed and i get that message when trying to install it?
